title: Indigenous Culture-Based Language Education Design: Autoethnographic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Participatory language learning environment incorporating Indigenous cultural symbols (star blankets), enhancing cultural understanding through shared learner experiences

learning_goals: Students can acquire 20 intermediate-level workplace language expressions through interaction with native-speaking instructors.
Students can develop strategies to connect their cultural background to language learning using autoethnographic methods (learning journals, peer feedback).
Students can design and present one language-use scenario reflecting symbolic elements (e.g., star blanket metaphor) of Indigenous cultures through team projects.

resources: Cultural Symbol Image Resources (e.g., Star Blankets)
Analog Engagement Tools (Post-it Notes, Wall Charts)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
